DOC.brief_summary: This is a study of the lung health of the population of Vancouver and the extent of, and the risk factors for, chronic obstructive lung disease.
DOC.brief_title: The Vancouver-BOLD Study: The Burden of Chronic Obstructive Lung Disease
DOC.criteria: 40 years of age and older Both sexes Random sample of population Contraindication for lung function testing and serious life threatening illness.
